      1 package templates
      2 
      3 import (
      4 	"bufio"
      5 	"encoding/base64"
      6 	"encoding/hex"
      7 	"fmt"
      8 	"html/template"
      9 	"os"
     10 	"path/filepath"
     11 	"strings"
     12 )
     13 
     14 func linkTag(nonce template.HTMLAttr, rel string, s string, m map[string]string) template.HTML {
     15 	hash := m[strings.TrimPrefix(s, "/")]
     16 	href := s + "?v=" + hash
     17 	hashBytes, _ := hex.DecodeString(hash)
     18 	integrity := "sha256-" + base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString(hashBytes)
     19 	return template.HTML(fmt.Sprintf(
     20 		`<link%s rel="%s" href="%s" integrity="%s" />`,
     21 		nonce, rel, href, integrity,
     22 	))
     23 }
     24 
     25 func scriptTag(nonce template.HTMLAttr, s string, m map[string]string) template.HTML {
     26 	hash := m[strings.TrimPrefix(s, "/")]
     27 	href := s + "?v=" + hash
     28 	hashBytes, _ := hex.DecodeString(hash)
     29 	integrity := "sha256-" + base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString(hashBytes)
     30 	return template.HTML(fmt.Sprintf(
     31 		`<script%s src="%s" integrity="%s"></script>`,
     32 		nonce, href, integrity,
     33 	))
     34 }
     35 
     36 func getFuncs() map[string]interface{} {
     37 	return map[string]interface{}{
     38 		"loop":      func(n int) []struct{} { return make([]struct{}, n) },
     39 		"toLineNum": func(n int) int { return n + 1 },
     40 		"linkTag":   linkTag,
     41 		"scriptTag": scriptTag,
     42 	}
     43 }
     44 
     45 func LoadTemplates(base string, templates map[string]*template.Template) error {
     46 	pattern := base + "/templates/common/*.html"
     47 	common := template.New("").Funcs(getFuncs())
     48 	common = template.Must(common.ParseGlob(pattern))
     49 
     50 	pattern = base + "/templates/*.html"
     51 	paths, err := filepath.Glob(pattern)
     52 	if err != nil {
     53 		return err
     54 	}
     55 	for _, path := range paths {
     56 		t := template.Must(common.Clone())
     57 		t = template.Must(t.ParseFiles(path))
     58 		templates[filepath.Base(path)] = t
     59 	}
     60 	return nil
     61 }
     62 
     63 func LoadAssetHashes(assetHashFile string, assetHashMap map[string]string) error {
     64 	file, err := os.Open(assetHashFile)
     65 	if err != nil {
     66 		return err
     67 	}
     68 	defer file.Close()
     69 
     70 	scanner := bufio.NewScanner(file)
     71 
     72 	for k := range assetHashMap {
     73 		delete(assetHashMap, k)
     74 	}
     75 
     76 	for scanner.Scan() {
     77 		pieces := strings.SplitN(scanner.Text(), "  ", 2)
     78 		hash := pieces[0]
     79 		asset := pieces[1]
     80 		(assetHashMap)[asset] = hash
     81 	}
     82 
     83 	return nil
     84 }
